-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Tool for sharing and using Elm libraries
--   
@package elm-get
@version 0.1.3

module Utils.Paths
internals :: [Char]
libDir :: FilePath
json :: [Char]
index :: [Char]
listing :: FilePath
library :: Name -> FilePath
libraryVersion :: Name -> Version -> FilePath
moduleToElmFile :: String -> FilePath
moduleToJsonFile :: String -> FilePath
swapDots :: String -> String
combinedJson :: FilePath

module Utils.Http
send :: String -> (Request -> Manager -> IO a) -> ErrorT String IO a
githubTags :: Name -> ErrorT String IO Tags
data Tags
Tags :: [String] -> Tags
instance Show Tags
instance FromJSON Tags

module Utils.Commands
yesOrNo :: IO Bool
inDir :: (MonadError String m, MonadIO m) => FilePath -> m a -> m a
copyDir :: (MonadError String m, MonadIO m) => FilePath -> FilePath -> m ()
copyDir' :: FilePath -> FilePath -> IO ()
git :: (MonadError String m, MonadIO m) => [String] -> m String
run :: (MonadError String m, MonadIO m) => String -> [String] -> m String
out :: (MonadError String m, MonadIO m) => String -> m ()
